Title: The Voluntary Sacrifice of Christ - Servant of God

Verses.21:
To this you were called,[*]
	because Christ suffered for you,
leaving us an example to follow,[*]
	that we should walk in his steps.
Verses.22:
He who never sinned,[*]
	nor tasted deceit in his mouth.
Verses.23:
When they slandered him,[*]
	he spoke not a vile word.
When he suffered,[*]
	he made no threats.

He gave himself into the hands[*]
	of the one who judges.
Verses.24:
He took our sins upon himself,[*]
	in his body upon the cross.

So that we might die to sin,[*]
	and live in righteousness.
It is by his wounds,[*]
	that we have been healed.
